Works perfectly. How to install for windows 7:
Open Rar, do the set up, go to: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steinberg\VSTPlugins" Copy everything in that folder to "C:\Program Files (x86)\VstPlugins" If the VstPlugins folder doesnt exist create one. Now put the Licence.dat into the Sylenth1 folder and wala
Thats how I got it to work for me. Thank you soo much for uplaoding this!
